title: A Hearse for Dark Harbor
description: A LEPER'S GHOSTRose was worried when her friend Helen went to live in a commune on Pirates Island. And when Helen wrote, saying that Rose should never again try to contact her, Rose knew she must come to Dark Harbor to find her friend.Thus began an ordeal of terror which would expose her to the sinister ghost of the Leper Mary - a ghost with no face, wearing a veil and a long black habit.And Rose, propelled into a miasma of violent treachery, dark occult ceremonies, and phantom hauntings, knew she might find her friend...but she might lose her sanity, perhaps even her life!
author: Clarissa Ross
